summary:
What a way to start a week:

We were away over new year to visit family, and on the way back our ICE (InterCityExpress - long distance train here in Germany) got cancelled after we spent one hour waiting in the cold on the tracks since it was delayed in 10 minute steps until finally being cancelled.  So we went to the information desk and asked what could be done to get home, and they offered us a Taxi drive.  So far so good, but the thing is: We were in Hamburg, and we round about life 500km away...
title: Week 58: A long drive home

title: The Easiest Way to Start Blogging - The 2025 Edition
